definition: to settle a matter by leaving it unsettled/to end up with nothing definite
(negative prefix)/not/no
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it

sentences.chinese: 这项指控后来也不了了之了。

sentences.english: Workload is very arduous, end up with nothing definite later.
sentences.chinese: 工作量是非常艰巨，后来不了了之。

sentences.english: It's an issue that will not go away, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这个问题不会不了了之。

sentences.english: The friend hits Mr Zhang thinks when his home plays, end up with nothing definite.
sentences.chinese: 张先生以为是朋友在他家玩时打的，便不了了之。

sentences.english: A leisurely process of decision - making creates a presumption in favor of eventual inaction.
sentences.chinese: 不慌不忙地作决定就会使人猜测是打算不了了之。

sentences.english: Everyone caught the thieve to the police station.
sentences.chinese: 大家把贼送到警察局，不了了之。

sentences.english: Talks have been in limbo since 2008.
sentences.chinese: 会谈自2008年以来就不了了之。

definition: to rush to conclude a matter/to end up abruptly
to drop (subject etc)
to die peacefully/(fig.) to result in failure (without any outside interference)/to come to nothing/to fizzle out
to part on bad terms/(of a meeting etc) to break up in discord
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
lit. paper can't wrap fire; fig. the truth will out
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to turn a blind eye

the end/an ending/to wind down/to conclude
